title: docs/examples/3rdparty_analysis_workflow.sh fails with fresh annex  7.20190912-1~ndall+1

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
discovered while testing https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/3648 PR with brand new annex.

docs/examples/3rdparty_analysis_workflow.sh fails
<details>
<summary>with `not available; No other repository is known to contain the file. ` on get</summary> 

```shell
I: running docs/examples/3rdparty_analysis_workflow.sh
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis 
create(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis (dataset)
[INFO   ] Cloning https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git [1 other candidates] into '/tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural' 
[INFO   ]   Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore 
install(ok): src/forrest_structural (dataset)
action summary:
  add (notneeded: 2, ok: 1)
  install (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
[submodule "src/forrest_structural"]
	path = src/forrest_structural
.                        [annex]  master  ✗ 2019-09-19/19:12:09  ✓  0 Bytes/0 Bytes
src/forrest_structural   [annex]  master  ✗ 2016-02-12/13:41:48  ✓  0 Bytes/2.6 GB
get(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural/sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w.nii.gz (file) [from mddatasrc...]
add(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis/code/get_required_data.sh (file) [non-large file; adding content to git repository]
add(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis/code/run_analysis.sh (file) [non-large file; adding content to git repository]
add(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis/code (directory)
save(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 3)
  save (ok: 1)
add(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis/result.txt (file)
save(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
[INFO   ] Cloning /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis into '/tmp/datalad_demo_alice.SXPF/bobs_analysis' 
install(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_alice.SXPF/bobs_analysis (dataset)
[INFO   ] Installing <Dataset path=/tmp/datalad_demo_alice.SXPF/bobs_analysis> recursively 
[INFO   ] Cloning /tmp/datalad_demo_bob.uoYL/myanalysis/src/forrest_structural [2 other candidates] into '/tmp/datalad_demo_alice.SXPF/bobs_analysis/src/forrest_structural' 
action summary:
  install (ok: 2)
get(ok): /tmp/datalad_demo_alice.SXPF/bobs_analysis/src/forrest_structural/sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w.nii.gz (file) [from origin...]
[WARNING] Running get resulted in stderr output: git-annex: get: 1 failed
 
[ERROR  ] not available; No other repository is known to contain the file. [get(/tmp/datalad_demo_alice.SXPF/bobs_analysis/result.txt)] 
get(error): /tmp/datalad_demo_alice.SXPF/bobs_analysis/result.txt (file) [not available; No other repository is known to contain the file.]
I: done running docs/examples/3rdparty_analysis_workflow.sh: failed
The command "if [ ${DATALAD_TESTS_SSH:-0} != 1 -o -n "${BUILD_DATALAD_EXTENSION:-}" ] || echo "${TMPDIR:-}" | grep -q ' '; then echo "Testing examples is disabled by configuration"; else $NOSE_WRAPPER ../tools/testing/run_doc_examples; fi" exited with 1.
```
</details>

and I replicated it locally on master of datalad, with `git-annex 7.20190912-1~ndall+1` .  Downgrade to `7.20190819+git2-g908476a9b-1~ndall+1` resolved the issue. (might be of interest to @joeyh) ... eh -- never enough tests!
unfortunately I am not in a condition to troubleshoot it ATM, just recording
